author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the olive oil in a casserole dish or large saucepan. Add the sausages and cook until browned on all sides. Add the onion and fry for 3-4 minutes. Add the garlic and fry for a further minute. Add the red wine, tomato purée, ketchup and beef stock and simmer for 8-10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the sausages are completely cooked through. To serve, pour into a serving bowl and scatter with the chopped herbs.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  3 Toulouse sausages, cut into 3 pieces,  ½ onion, chopped,  2 garlic cloves, chopped,  75ml/2½fl oz red wine,  1 tbsp tomato purée,  2 tsp tomato ketchup,  150ml/¼ pint hot beef stock,  handful each fresh chives and parsley, chopped, to serve
